item.title: Android App Dev (Java)
item.description: After taking Gateway Computing: Java at Hopkins last semester, I have decided that making some kind of android app would probably be the best way to further my java knowledge and know-how, keep my coding skills sharp, and make something I can personally use and tht I can add to my resume as a project, and maybe even release. The App I think fitness tracker/helper type app would be a good first option.
